title: India needs to lead in AI while prioritising empathy in tech adoption, says Mukesh Ambani
description: Mukesh Ambani calls for India to become a global leader in artificial intelligence. He stresses the importance of empathy in adopting new technologies. Reliance Industries is nearing solutions for India's energy challenges using solar power and storage. The company aims to provide abundant and affordable green energy for India and the world. RIL is transforming into an innovation-led, deep-tech company.
content:

title: Here are 5 key events that drove the stock market last week
description: Stocks finished higher Friday, lifted by the volatile artificial intelligence trade, leading the market to the upside for the week.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Empowering Growth: AI and Development at Chintan Shivir
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Why the architects of AI matter more than the tools
description: ARTIFICIAL intelligence is often described as if it arrived on its own, an inevitable upgrade — a wave no one could stop. In the Philippines, from BPO floors to sari-sari store Facebook pages, AI is already slipping into daily routines. We increasingly treat it as something we simply have to accept.

title: Real-time AI seen boosting hospital operations, patient care in the Philippines

title: Burkinabe teen no regrets over viral French 'coup' video
description: PARIS, France — Adnan Sidibe, a Burkinabe teenager who used artificial intelligence to post fake news of a French coup on Facebook got more than he bargained for.
content:
PARIS, France — Adnan Sidibe, a Burkinabe teenager who used artificial intelligence to post fake news of a French coup on Facebook got more than he bargained for.

title: Championing the Indianisation of Law: Justice Maheshwari's Vision
description: Justice Dinesh Maheshwari advocates for the Indianisation of India's legal system, highlighting the importance of the nation's diversity, humane values, and authentic intelligence over artificial intelligence. During a lecture, he emphasized the enduring strength of Indian civilization. Kerala Governor also stressed the propagation of the rich values of the Indian knowledge system.
content:
Justice Dinesh Maheshwari, Chairman of India's Law Commission, has made a call for 'Indianisation' of the legal system.

title: India must become world leader in AI, can present new model of development that combines intelligence with empathy: Mukesh Ambani
description: The world has entered a new era of Artificial Intelligence and India must become world leaders in AI, Reliance Industries Chairman and Managing Director Mukesh Ambani said on Saturday, noting that the country can present a new model of development to the rest of the world that combines intelligence with empathy and prosperity with purpose.

title: Housework could die out in three years as Robo-Cop appliances do our chores
